experiences.title: Tools Programmer
experiences.description: Working as a Tools Programmer at Ubisoft Montréal.

experiences.title: Full-stack Developer
experiences.description:
Developed a complete solution for an enterprise-grade CRM:
  • Development of an API with .NET7, including features like SignalR data transfer, EFCore ORM, Background Worker, Controller/Services architecture design, etc.
  • Developed a Web App using Vue.JS and the Vuexy framework, utilizing features like google maps API, bootstrap-vue, JWT login, etc.
  • Documented the technical aspects of the project using VuePress.
  • Deployed the solution on Azure Web app and Azure Static Web App using custom CI/CD script (Github actions).
  • Managed issue tracking (Github) and project management, overseeing 2 other part-time developers who assisted in building the solution.
  • Refactored and added functionality to an old codebase in VB.NET.

experiences.title: Devops intern
experiences.description: Supported and built a CI/CD solution for internal projects. Utilized recent technologies including: python, go, github actions, maven, etc.

experiences.title: Software Developer

.NET intern and part-time job during school.
- Refactored a PDF parser software written in c# and added features.
- Migrated project to git source control for my team.

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.description: Fixed bugs and developed features for a CRM software used in schools and school boards across Québec.

experiences.title: Team Trainer

education.description:
Currently studying Software Engineering since the fall of 2021.
• Named Captain of ApplETS, a scientific club focused on mobile development. Working on and maintaining ÉTSMobile 4.0, an application that allows students to view their grades, schedules, and important links. Used by over 10,000 students at my school.
• Organized 3 events with key contributors (Intact and BNC) from ApplETS and held weekly meetings for the past year with our members.
• Completed a course on algorithms (graphs, trees, search algorithms).
• GPA: 3.46

Completed my DEC in Computer Science with a focus on management. Participated and nominated as the president of the security club in 2018 and 2019.
• With the club, conducted evening courses on software security and organized a CTF (Capture The Flag) hacking competition between schools.
Designed a prototype for a dog food dispenser robot.
